title: Coming back to League after a long time
body: So I haven't played League of Legends in a long time, however I still have an account with items I purchased and I don't want to lose them by creating a new account. But I'm afraid I'm way to bad to play with other people who aren't newcomers/backcomers, can I somehow start over with the same account and just select a diffrent groupe of people to play with? (When you start a new account you can choose if you want to be matched with people with diffrent levels of experience or total newcomers ect.)

replies.body: Hmmmmm starting a new account in League doesn't let you choose the skill level of players that you're matched with, so it may not actually be beneficial at all for you to start a new one. If you were playing ranked, that rank will most likely have been soft reset by now as well.
